reviews.review:
This game is very good and will always have has a place in my heart. 
Rag doll engine was ahead of its time.  
You can run it on a potato and it still looks flipen amazing.   
Overall story is amazing.
The achievements are mind boggling fun and make you think (One is bugged) but there are guides to fix it.
Lambda achievement can die in a fire! 
 Valve shut up and take my money. 
10/10 overall

I played this in 2021 for the first time.  Anyone going to read this 17 years after the game's release?  Oh well, I'll say some things anyway.  It's worth a playthrough if you like Sci-Fi singleplayer FPS games, just don't expect too much, and don't look for an engaging story or challenge.

It was influential historically for its lack of cut scenes and its physics engine.  The physics engine is definitely the central novelty here, to the point that the game will either highly incentivize or completely restrict you to the use of a specific weapon at times in the game.

Unfortunately I never felt immersed by the areas in Half-Life 2.  I played Black Mesa (remake of Half-Life 1) and I really felt a sense of place during it.  HL2 felt like I was merely moving down a long path that was mostly straight ahead.  Somehow Black Mesa felt like it had more verticality in its levels, there felt like a better variety to the feels of each area.  The vehicle sections in HL2 no doubt contributed to this corridor feel, although they were a bit fun if you don't get too frustrated with the controls.

The combat was okay.  I mostly felt like enemies were thrown into an area in small groups to have something to shoot once in awhile, but rarely felt like they were organic to the situation I was in.  The story is okay, nothing too mind-provoking or engaging.

Last but not least I'm sure there are people who, since 2004, are still trying to get their AI companions to GET...OUT...OF...THE...WAY!
Игра очень затягивает.

Ну это просто.

This is if not my all-time favorite FPS game ever. You slip back into the shoes of the man Gordon Freeman when he has been woken up by the G-man from stasis. You're now in a town called City 17, and you're up against a threat known as the Combine. It's up to you to take them on and to lead the Resistance. This is definitely the best game out there, you have not lived until you've played this game.

Genel olarak bu oyun beni kültür şokuna uğrattı diyebilirim çünkü daha önce fps hikaye türünde bir oyunu baştan sona bitirmemiştim. Umarım hissetiğim hissi başka bir oyunda yıllar sonra hissedebilirim.

Definetly a good game, thrilling story, good shooter sections, the nice community. I installed a mod which isnt the point on my review, but i'll explain. The raw game is good as it is, but with mods, it gets better, but if you dont know how to install mods, just play the raw game. But i recommend it to you very much, because it has this sci-fi horror shooter feeling, if you like that style, buy it, If you dont like the theme, you can download mods for the game that change the theme.

Half life.... Je m'en était jamais vraiment interéssé, jusqu'au jour où manquant de jeu qui m'aiderai à passer mon temps libres, j'ai décidé d'acheter le 2 pour tester, je me suis dis que si c'est un jeu qui est toujours connu malgré le temps, je n'aurais sûrement rien à perdre de prendre ce classique dans ma bibliothèque : j'avais raison

Comme à l'abitude de Vavle : HALF LIFE 2 EST UN CHEF D'OEUVRE, il possèdent des graphiques plutôt nul en 2021 mais reste vraiment jouable sans qu'on s'en rentre compte, il a l'avantage de tournée sur n'importe quel config ( procceseur pourri, pas de carte graphique et 2GB ram = ÇA TOURNE EN 60 FPS) 
Au niveau de sa durée de vie , on est sur 15-20h et plus de 30h pour ceux qui aiment s'arrêter sur les détails 
Au niveau du scénario on est vraiment sur quelque chose de construit et on a le plaisir de retrouvé les anciens personnes d'half life 1 
Au niveau du level design, il est bien plus important que sur half life 1 , les décors sont bien plus poussé et on a souvent des moments en extérieur, pas de Xen ce qui est pas plus mal 
Au niveau du Gameplay à pars deux trois moment plutôt long, on s'amuse ! On balancé des objets à la tronche de nos ennemi, on les vises avec une arbalète sniper de 500m , on les écrasés avec une voiture, dresse des araignée pour les buters, ou les éclaté de prêt à coup de fusil à pompe : y'en à vraiment pour tout les coup 😂

Bref, voilà j'ai essayé half life 2 et j'ai accroché sur la série et pris le BUNDLE
je vous le conseille vraiment avant le 1 si vous voulez essayer la saga, le 1 à de graphismes trop médiocre pour vous vous faire aimez quoi que ce sois ( sauf si vous étiez enfant en 1998 et que vous avez la nostalgie) 
À prendre et à jouer sans aucune modération !
